title: "Untitled" by Joshua Darden
content: Does anyone know where you can buy Joshua Daren's Untitled typeface? Or is it even available? Has anyone heard?
author: sshuman

comments.content:
Village, FontShop, and Joshua Darden's own website are the 3 places that come to mind, though I'm not sure if that particular typeface is available. Email him.

David
Untitled. Great name for a typeface.
We used to get yelled at back in art school whenever we wrote 'untitled' for the title of one of our pieces. ;o)
and rightly so. if you're going to leave something untitled, the least you can manage to do is not right anything -- might make selling your fonts a bit tricky?

The Untitled face has been released as Jubilant:

[https://www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/jubilat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108094520/https:/www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/jubilat "https://www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/jubilat")

Mikey :-)
